title: GYM TECH logo
content:
Hi friends

Help me ID the font used for the logo of GYM TECH

Thanks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819035051im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gym-tech-logo_4509.jpg)
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content: That is one of the DIN fonts.
Hrm. Like I said, one of the DIN fonts. ;^)

Sorry guys, but it's ITC Conduit Medium.

Miss Tiffany, notice the angle of the terminals on the C.
EHE. The emoticon is supposed to let you know that I realize I was wrong. And that I'm being sarcastic. Sorry, I guess sarcasm doesn't translate.

I got it Tiffany - but then I'm British.

Nick Cooke
Thanks, Nick. Glad to see that someone understands me. :)
hehe. I totally missed it. I'll have to remember that for next time. ;P
